thread.title: Stellar service!
thread.title_full: Stellar service! - Review of Hilton Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Diana A
title: Stellar service!
text: We were staying at the Hilton Times Sq for only one night but was flying out of JFK the next day on a very late flight in the evening. We had asked for a late check out because of this late flight. David Cirincione was the one who assisted us. He not only gave us a generous late check out, he was happy to accommodate us with this request. Because of him, we had a place to leave our things safely without having to carry it around with us all day as we explored the city, and it gave us a place to come back and freshen up at before leaving to the airport. Thank you David for helping us out, and making the travel experience so much easier!
